# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $120. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $105 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a discount, so don't hesitate to make your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $105. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $105
(2) Reject Alice's offer
